private.description: Indicates if the repository is private.

html_url.description: URL of the repository's GitHub page.

fork.description: Indicates if the repository is a fork.

assignees_url.description: URL to fetch assignees for issues in the repository.

blobs_url.description: URL to fetch blobs within the repository.

branches_url.description: URL to fetch branches within the repository.

collaborators_url.description: URL to fetch collaborators of the repository.

comments_url.description: URL to fetch comments within the repository.

commits_url.description: URL to fetch commits within the repository.

compare_url.description: URL to compare references within the repository.

contents_url.description: URL to fetch contents within the repository.

contributors_url.description: URL to fetch contributors to the repository.

deployments_url.description: URL to fetch deployments related to the repository.

downloads_url.description: URL to fetch downloads linked to the repository.

events_url.description: URL to fetch events related to the repository.

forks_url.description: URL to fetch forks of the repository.

git_commits_url.description: URL to fetch git commits within the repository.

git_refs_url.description: URL to fetch git references within the repository.

git_tags_url.description: URL to fetch git tags within the repository.

git_url.description: URL for Git protocol to interact with the repository.

issue_comment_url.description: URL to fetch issue comments within the repository.

issue_events_url.description: URL to fetch issue events within the repository.

issues_url.description: URL to fetch issues within the repository.

keys_url.description: URL to fetch keys associated with the repository.

labels_url.description: URL to fetch labels associated with the repository.

languages_url.description: URL to fetch languages used in the repository.

merges_url.description: URL to fetch merges related to the repository.

milestones_url.description: URL to fetch milestones within the repository.

notifications_url.description: URL to manage notifications for the repository.

pulls_url.description: URL to fetch pull requests within the repository.

releases_url.description: URL to fetch releases related to the repository.

stargazers_url.description: URL to fetch users who starred the repository.

statuses_url.description: URL to fetch commit statuses within the repository.

subscribers_url.description: URL to fetch subscribers of the repository.

subscription_url.description: URL to manage subscriptions to notifications for the repository.

tags_url.description: URL to fetch tags within the repository.

trees_url.description: URL to fetch trees within the repository.

hooks_url.description: URL to manage webhooks for the repository.

language.description: Main programming language used in the repository.

forks_count.description: Count of forks for the repository.

stargazers_count.description: Number of stars the repository has received.

watchers_count.description: Count of watchers for the repository.

size.description: Size of the repository in kilobytes.

open_issues_count.description: Count of open issues in the repository.

is_template.description: Indicates if the repository is a template.

items.description: Individual topic related to the repository.

html_url.description: URL to view license details on the web.

has_issues.description: Indicates if the repository has issues enabled.

has_projects.description: Indicates if the repository has projects enabled.

has_wiki.description: Indicates if the repository has a wiki enabled.

has_pages.description: Indicates if the repository has GitHub Pages enabled.

has_downloads.description: Indicates if the repository has downloads available.

archived.description: Indicates if the repository is archived.

disabled.description: Indicates if the repository is disabled.

pushed_at.description: Date and time when the repository was last pushed to.

created_at.description: Date and time when the repository was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the repository was last updated.

permissions.description: Permissions granted to different roles for the repository.

allow_forking.description: Indicates if forking is allowed for the repository.

forks.description: Forks information related to the repository.

has_discussions.description: Indicates if the repository has discussions.

open_issues.description: Number of open issues in the repository.

web_commit_signoff_required.description: Indicates if web commit sign-off is required for contributions.

security_and_analysis.description: Security and analysis settings of the repository.
